scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:bds: npm run build:beh && npm run build:res
scripts.build:beh: npm run clean:beh && npm run init:beh && npm run build && npm run copy:beh
scripts.build:res: npm run clean:res && npm run init:res && npm run copy:res
scripts.build:github: npm run build:beh:github && npm run build:res:github
scripts.build:beh:github: npm run clean:beh:github && npm run init:beh:github && npm run build && npm run copy:beh:github
scripts.build:res:github: npm run clean:res:github && npm run init:res:github && npm run copy:res:github
scripts.copy:beh: cd ../../ && echo node_modules\ > exclude.txt && echo dev\ >> exclude.txt && echo .idea\ >> exclude.txt && xcopy ".\development_behavior_packs\Maos BP" "C:\Users\%USERNAME%\Documents\bds\development_behavior_packs\Maos BP" /E /Y /exclude:exclude.txt && del exclude.txt
scripts.copy:beh:github: cd ../../ && echo node_modules\ > exclude.txt && echo scripts\ >> exclude.txt && echo .idea\ >> exclude.txt && xcopy ".\development_behavior_packs\Maos BP" "C:\Users\%USERNAME%\Documents\Github\Maos\Maos BP" /E /Y /exclude:exclude.txt && del exclude.txt
